hook.text: A change leader won over the CEO and frontline teams. One forgotten VP derailed the entire initiative.

buildup.text: Not all stakeholders are equal. Some have power, some have influence, and some have both.

discovery.text: Map stakeholders by influence and support. Prioritize winning over the high-influence skeptics.

twist.text: The quiet skeptic with high influence is more dangerous than the loud critic with none.

climax.text: Identify your key stakeholders. Understand their concerns. Address those concerns before going public.

punchline.text: Know who matters most. Win them first. The rest follows.

quiz.question: Why is stakeholder mapping important for change management?
options: It helps identify high-influence skeptics who could derail the initiative
All stakeholders have equal power and should be treated identically
Stakeholder mapping is only needed for very large organizations
